org.microbean.jersey.container.grizzly2.http.cdi.extension

Class HttpServerStartingExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microbean.cdi.AbstractBlockingExtension
      • org.microbean.jersey.container.grizzly2.http.cdi.extension.HttpServerStartingExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Extension

    public class HttpServerStartingExtension
extends AbstractBlockingExtension
    An AbstractBlockingExtension that searches for any HttpServer instances in the current CDI container and, for each one, starts it.

    A blocking event is then fired to keep the container up and running while the HttpServers are running.

    Author:
    Laird Nelson
    See Also:
    HttpServer, HttpServer.start(), AbstractBlockingExtension
